parameters.name: Lower_Rate_Limit
parameters.description: Lower pacing rate limit. Heart rate cannot fall below this value; used to calculate timing cycles (RR = 60000/LRL ms).

parameters.name: Upper_Rate_Limit
parameters.description: Upper pacing rate limit. Restricts maximum pacing frequency.

parameters.name: Atrial_Amplitude
parameters.description: Atrial pacing pulse voltage amplitude, determines stimulation intensity.

parameters.name: Atrial_Pulse_Width
parameters.description: Atrial pacing pulse width, combined with amplitude determines energy delivery.

parameters.name: ARP
parameters.description: Atrial Refractory Period: Used in AAI/AAIR to ignore signals post-pacing and prevent false triggering.

parameters.name: VRP
parameters.description: Ventricular Refractory Period: Used in VVI/VVIR to ignore T-waves etc. and prevent false sensing.

parameters.name: Atrial_Sensitivity
parameters.description: Atrial sensing threshold. Lower values increase sensitivity to detect weaker P waves; 0 = sensing disabled.

parameters.name: Ventricular_Sensitivity
parameters.description: Ventricular sensing threshold. Lower values increase sensitivity to detect weaker QRS complexes; 0 = sensing disabled.

parameters.name: PVARP
parameters.description: Post Ventricular Atrial Refractory Period. Prevents atrial sensing immediately after ventricular event to avoid false triggers from far-field R-waves.

parameters.name: Maximum_Sensor_Rate
parameters.description: Maximum rate-adaptive pacing rate. Pacemaker will not exceed this rate even with maximum activity level.

parameters.name: Activity_Threshold
parameters.validRange: V-Low, Low, Med-Low, Med, Med-High, High, V-High
parameters.description: Activity sensor detection threshold. Higher thresholds require more vigorous activity to trigger rate adaptation.

parameters.name: Response_Factor
parameters.description: Determines how aggressively the pacing rate increases in response to detected activity. Higher values = faster rate increase.

parameters.name: Reaction_Time
parameters.description: Time for pacing rate to accelerate from LRL to activity-indicated rate after activity onset.

parameters.name: Recovery_Time
parameters.description: Time for pacing rate to decelerate from elevated rate back to LRL after activity cessation.
